channel.title: How would i add another
channel.description:
[img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/7133/90068078.png[/img]
How would i add a tab thing next to "Members" that says "Webclient"
Not good at html.
Its a .smffy page so :o

item.title: How would i add another
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

CAN you access the smf files through ftp or something?
If so, it’s possibly cuz i done it.

Read full topic

item.title: How would i add another
item.dc:creator: @Mountainbit Mountainbit
item.description:
@Mountainbit wrote:

If its a free smf host. You’re probably not going to be able to modifiy the main files.

Read full topic

item.title: How would i add another
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Taharok:

It depends on the version of SMF you’re using. If it’s before 2.0, you’ll need to modify the board index template. Otherwise post 2.0, you will need to add a new page in one of the Subs source files. (I think it’s just the core Subs.php one). Look in the simple machines community for more information.

Its before 2.0 i clicked upgrade but nothing happen

Anyways, i was looking through admin section and found nothing that would change it, where would the board index template be?

Read full topic

item.title: How would i add another
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It depends on the version of SMF you’re using. If it’s before 2.0, you’ll need to modify the board index template. Otherwise post 2.0, you will need to add a new page in one of the Subs source files. (I think it’s just the core Subs.php one). Look in the simple machines community for more information.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:19, topic:424016”][quote author=t4 link=topic=526667.msg3840378#msg3840378 date=1323189247]
or just buy hosting…

[quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=526667.msg3840377#msg3840377 date=1323189241]

Same, but I have a different webhost. [paid is the best!]
[/quote]Why pay if you can get what you need for phr33

because free ones are limiting and unreliable.
[/quote]Meh, reliable enough and i don’t care if it’s limited since i don’t need more.[/quote]
if you plan to become larger than a 100 user database, you’ll hurt

Here, I recommend this;

http://download.simplemachines.org/

Free Web Hosting

Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL and cPanel, No Ads

Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, free Website Builder, cPanel and no ads. Almost unlimited free website hosting and free domain hosting. Host website for Free.

http://www.simplemachines.org/community/index.php?topic=382807.0

http://freecocc.com/

That’s what I used for my website/webclient/vote pages. It works wonders and you can edit every little detail of it :P[/quote]Yep, i use the same, except other webhost.
